tool_description: The YouTube Top Search Terms API enables users to retrieve the top trending search terms on YouTube based on a specified input search term. By providing a search term as a parameter, the API returns a list of the most popular and relevant search queries currently associated with the input. This information can be valuable for content creators, marketers, and analysts looking to understand the current interests and trends within the YouTube platform.
